name: Sudoku - Classic Board Games, Free Logic Puzzles!
name_original: Sudoku - Classic Board Games, Free Logic Puzzles!
description:
Sudoku, the classic puzzle game is now available for iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad! Discover this great version of Sudoku and join thousands of other addicted players!

- Five levels of difficulty from very easy to very hard.
- Clean and crisp graphics.
- Relaxing classic gameplay.

DOWNLOAD NOW!
